Package com.neu.prattle.service

Interface FriendService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    FriendServiceImpl
    public interface FriendService
    A class to handle CRUD DB operations for persistent Friend objects

    • Method Summary

    • Method Detail

      • sendFriendRequest

        void sendFriendRequest​(Friend friend)
        Sends a friend request
        Parameters:
        friend - is a Friend object representing the potential friendship

      • approveFriendRequest

        void approveFriendRequest​(User sender,
                          User recipient,
                          boolean isApproved)
        Approves or denies a friend request
        Parameters:
        sender - is the User sending the request
        recipient - is the User receiving the request
        isApproved - is the answer of the recipient

      • findAllFriends

        java.util.Collection<Friend> findAllFriends​(User user)
        Returns all Friends for a User
        Parameters:
        user - is a User
        Returns:
        all Friends that a User has if they have any

      • findFriendByUsers

        java.util.Optional<Friend> findFriendByUsers​(User sender,
                                             User recipient)
        Returns the Friend object representing the friendship between two Users
        Parameters:
        sender - is the sender of the friend request
        recipient - is the recipient of the friend request
        Returns:
        the Friend object if it exists, else Optional.Empty()

      • deleteFriend

        void deleteFriend​(Friend friend)
        Removes a Friend
        Parameters:
        friend - is the Friend to remove

      • isTest

        boolean isTest()
        Specifies if the instance of this is configured to use the test databse
        Returns:
        true if test database, else false
